author: Rachel Kaser
title: Humble’s Conquer COVID-19 Bundle offers some kickass games for charity
description: Humble joins the gaming industry’s efforts to aid coronavirus relief, in this case by offering a massive bundle of games for $30, all of which will go to charities providing COVID-19 relief. It’s a frighteningly small price to pay considering you get so many …
